descr.p: When a subspecies is elevated to species we call it a split.

ul.li: aSubspeciesId: A subspecies primary key value.

element.name: LumpTaxon
element.short: Lump a species to another species as a subspecies.

descr.p: When a species is relegated as subspecies to another species, we call it a lump.

ul.li: aSpecies: The species primary key to be lumped.
ToSpecies: The destination species primary key.

element.name: MoveToSpecies
element.short: Move a subspecies to another species.

element.name: MoveToGenus
element.short: Move a species to another genus.
